definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: name of some comparatively insignif. product of vine ([[גֶּפֶן הַיַּיִן]]), the eating of which was included in prohibition to Nazi-rite; skin of grape, so Thes (after Onk Mishna Maaser. 5:§ 4, Orla 1:§ 8, cf. Sifre ad loc.): [[מֵחַרְחַנִּים וְעַד־זׇג֗ לאׁ יאׁכֵָל]] Nu 6:4 (NH [[זג]], [[זוג]]; so called as transparent ? cf. Aram. [[חְגוּגִיתָא]] zaguwgiyto0 glass, NH [[זַגׇּג]] glazier (Ar. zuja0jun glass, is a loan-wd. acc. to Frä:64); cf. theory of √ in Lag:Ges. Ath. 41, Fl:1. c.: but in Heb. glass is [[זְכוֹכִית]]).
